term.title: topotactic transition

item.text: A transition in which the crystal lattice of the product phase shows one or more crystallographically equivalent, orientational relationships to the crystal lattice of the parent phase. Example: Transitions in which the anionic array is unchanged during the transition but cation reorganization occurs, as in: [image: Not defined]
